alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through 300 PM PDT... At 216 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles north of Austin, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Valley and State Route 305 about 20 to 30 miles north of Austin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
